item.title: Go os.exec
item.description: Go os.exec golang基础的执行命令操作如下 基础命令执行 func TestSingleCommand(t *testing.T) { stdout, err := exec.Command("uname", "-a").CombinedOutput() if err != nil { t.Error(err) return } t.Log(stdout) } 基础超时操作 func TestSingleTimeoutCommand(t *testing.T) { ctx, cancel := context.WithTimeout(context.Background(), 5*time.Second) defer cancel() stdout, err := exec.CommandContext(ctx, "ping", "-c 2", "-i 1",

item.title: Go File学习
item.description:
Go File学习 就写一个test方法 func TestFile(t *testing.T) { dir := "/tmp/hello" path := "/tmp/hello.txt" // create dir os.Mkdir(dir, 0755) // create file file, _ := os.OpenFile(path, os.O_CREATE|os.O_APPEND|os.O_WRONLY, 0644) // filePath fmt.Printf("File.name(file full path): %v 
", file.Name()) fmt.Println(filepath.Dir(file.Name())) fmt.Println(filepath.Abs(filepath.Dir(os.Args[0]))) // current pwd pwd, err := os.Getwd() fmt.Printf("current pwd: %s
", pwd) pwd, err = filepath.Abs("./") fmt.Printf("current pwd: %s
", pwd)

item.title: Go--time
item.description:
Go time学习 func Test_time(t *testing.T) { // current time fmt.Printf("current time : %s
", time.Now()) // format fmt.Printf("current time (ANSIC): %s
", time.Now().Format(time.ANSIC)) fmt.Printf("current time (Stamp): %s
", time.Now().Format(time.Stamp)) fmt.Printf("current time (RFC1123): %s
", time.Now().Format(time.RFC1123)) fmt.Printf("current time (UnixDate): %s
", time.Now().Format(time.UnixDate)) fmt.Printf("current time (YYYY-MM-DD): %s
", time.Now().Format("2006-01-02")) fmt.Printf("current time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss): %s
", time.Now().Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05")) fmt.Printf("current time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm): %s
", time.Now().Format("2006-01-02 15:04")) // year month day weekday fmt.Printf("yearday: %d
", time.Now().YearDay()) fmt.Printf("current Year:

item.description: 规范 命名规范 包名是小写单词，不应该有下划线或混合大小写，保持简洁，不要过早考虑包名冲突 使用驼峰而非下划线来命名函数或者变量 接口名称必须是er

item.title: MongoDB-Sharding
item.description: Sharding sh 命令 rs0:PRIMARY> sh.help() sh.addShard( host ) server:port OR setname/server:port sh.enableSharding(dbname) enables sharding on the database dbname sh.shardCollection(fullName,key,unique) shards the collection sh.splitFind(fullName,find) splits the chunk that find is in at the median sh.splitAt(fullName,middle) splits the chunk that middle is in at middle sh.moveChunk(fullName,find,to) move the chunk where 'find' is to 'to' (name of shard) sh.setBalancerState( <bool on or not> ) turns the balancer on or off true=on, false=off
